Coinbase's Allies Join Crypto Firm's Case Against SEC https://www.coindesk.com/policy/2024/03/19/coinbases-allies-join-crypto-firms-case-against-sec/?utm_medium=referral&utm_source=rss&utm_campaign=headlines VZ5REBZX4RHVDBBAJWQ2JXD67I Jesse HamiltonSeveral allies joined Coinbase Inc. (COIN) in its court fight against the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) to force the agency to rethink its refusal to write specific rules to govern the crypto industry, with Paradigm, the Crypto Council for Innovation and others filing outside arguments with the circuit court. Tue, 19 Mar 2024 13:41:30 +0000 2024-03-19T14:58:42.548+00:00 PolicynewsRegulationsCoinbaseSecurities and Exchange CommissionParadigmCrypto Council for InnovationCourt CasesSeveral groups jumped in to support CEO Brian Armstrong's Coinbase against Chair Gary Gensler's Securities and Exchange Commission in the effort to force the regulator to write crypto rules. (CoinDesk)
